libretinex Documentation

0.1.0.99

Introduction

This package implements an image processing algorithm for luminance normalization in gray images.

The only class of this package library is libretinex::Retinex.

The package also provides a binary called retinex-me which allows the transformation of images through the command line. See the binary man page for more information.
